item.description: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Kalynivka, Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Mykolayivka, Zalizne, Andriyivka, Dyliyivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
